document.full_text: ten san quentin inmates helped rescue a man and woman after their boat overturned in the san francisco bay, authorities said on thursday, but one of the boaters later died.
document.title: prison inmates rescue boaters from san francisco bay
lines_and_colors: ten san quentin inmates helped rescue a man and woman after their boat overturned in the san francisco bay, authorities said on thursday, but one of the boaters later died.
